seo.title: Manarola Hiking 2025 | Via dell'Amore & Vineyard Trails
seo.description: Best hiking trails from Manarola including Via dell'Amore, vineyard paths, and routes to Corniglia and Riomaggiore.

body.title: Hiking Trails
body.subtitle: Discover spectacular coastal paths, ancient vineyard trails, and the famous Via dell'Amore. Manarola is the perfect base for exploring Cinque Terre on foot.

features.title: Via dell'Amore
features.description: Romantic coastal path to Riomaggiore. Easy 20-minute walk with stunning sea views.

features.title: Trail to Corniglia
features.description: Classic 2-hour coastal hike through vineyards and olive groves. Moderate difficulty.

features.title: Vineyard Loop
features.description: Walk through terraced vineyards above the village. Learn about wine production.

features.title: Sanctuary of Volastra
features.description: Uphill trail to historic hilltop sanctuary. Panoramic views of three villages.

features.title: Blue Trail SVA
features.description: Famous coastal path connecting all five villages. Spectacular but challenging.

features.title: Punta Bonfiglio Path
features.description: Short walk to the best sunset viewpoint. Cemetery platform overlooks the harbor.
